revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: ... to his father. Greetings! Give me notice (whether I should abandon my own occupations ?) ... sail down the river or to await your arrival ... sail farther up the river. Please give me also notice ... or to give it ... (I want you) to know that the (monolinoi?) have gone missing (in the) warehouse (?) situated in Neilou (polis?) (when) I and (NN) were there ... has asked you (wishing ?) [Two and a half lines practically illegible]. ... accomplishing (all things necessary ?) in relation to the business. I pray on your behalf every day (to lord) Sarapis. Greet Leon? and all your beloved ones (by name ?) ... from the farmers ...;2nd hand: Two lines in very cursive handwriting; meaning not intelligible.
